description: Uzi Doorman is the rebellious protagonist of Murder Drones, a worker drone who initially fights against disassembly drones and humanity.  She develops a friendship and later a relationship with N, while grappling with the influence of the Absolute Solver, a powerful AI.  Uzi's personality is a mix of rebelliousness, paranoia, and developing empathy, eventually leading to reconciliation with her family and a more settled life within her colony.
